sentences.sContent: The study demonstrates the link between poverty and malnutrition.
sentences.sCn: 这项研究证明了贫困与营养不良之间的联系。

sentences.sContent: The government now has an opportunity to demonstrate its commitment to reform.
sentences.sCn: 政府现在有机会表明改革的决心了。

sentences.sContent: He has demonstrated an ability to meet deadlines.
sentences.sCn: 他展示了如期完成任务的能力。

remMethod.val: de(表加强) ＋ monstr(表示) ＋ ate(做) → 加强表示 → 论证

words.tran: 说明的；证明的；公开表露感情的
示威者；论证者；指示者；证明者

trans.tranOther: to show or prove something clearly
